fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Attack a player for 1 HP, with their adjacent players being attacked for 1 HP. If the main target of the bomb defends, the adjacent playersâ€™ attacks will be secretly nullified.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Attack a player for 3 HP, with their adjacent players being attacked for 1 HP. The adjacent players will still have to defend even if the main target defends.

*Bomb acts as an Area of Effect (AoE) attack, where it hits players in a radius. (i.e you hit Player 2, it will hit Player 1 and Player 3 due to AoE)*
